top_questions.text: Study the given program and answer the given questions. (2) DECLARE SUB SUM(N) CLS INPUT "Enter any number"; N CALL SUM(N) END SUB SUM(N) WHILE N > 0 R = N MOD 10 T = T + R N = N \ 10 WEND PRINT "The Sum of individual digit is"; T END SUB Questions:​

A sequential file "detail.dat" contains Name, Age and mobile number of few persons. Write a QBASIC program to display the name of those persons who are eligible to cast the vote. [Age must be 18 or above to cast vote]. (4)
Write the appropriate technical terms for the following: (2×1=2)
